sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est très enthousiaste dans son travail.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is very enthusiastic about work.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ gāng shōudào nǐ de yóujiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je viens de recevoir ton email.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I just received your email.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le poisson nage dans l'eau.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The fish swims in the water.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们的产品有很大的优势。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen de chǎnpǐn yǒu hěn dà de yōushì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Notre produit a de grands avantages.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Our product has great advantages.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 请告诉我你的邮箱地址。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng gàosu wǒ nǐ de yóuxiāng dìzhǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Donne-moi ton adresse email s'il te plaît.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please tell me your email address.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ shōucáng le hěn duō yóupiào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai collectionné beaucoup de timbres.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I have collected many stamps.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime aller nager en été.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like to go swimming in summer.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il faut préparer la leçon avant le cours.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You should preview the lesson before class.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les enfants jouent à des jeux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The children are playing games.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ne t'inquiète pas, on a plein de temps.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Don't worry, there's plenty of time.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est très avantageux pour nous.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is very favorable for us.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā duì gōngzuò yāoqiú hěn gāo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a des exigences élevées pour le travail.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has high requirements for work.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'entreprise compte cinq cents employés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The company has five hundred employees.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est le chanteur principal du groupe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is the lead singer of the band.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est ma responsabilité.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is my responsibility.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime lire des magazines de mode.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like reading fashion magazines.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'économie croît rapidement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The economy is growing rapidly.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ yào yī zhāng huǒchē piào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je voudrais un billet de train.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want a train ticket.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 会议展开了热烈的讨论。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Huìyì zhǎnkāi le rèliè de tǎolùn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La réunion a donné lieu à une discussion animée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The meeting launched a lively discussion.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le journaliste est en train d'interviewer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The journalist is conducting an interview.
